Hi Chathushka, Thank you for contacting Sunlight Sri Lanka ! 
If you wish to register with us as a Distributor (Business Partner to sell Unilever products in a given territory) please send us a request letter through normal post addressed to the Head of Customer Development Operations.

The letter should cover few main areas,
• Business Background (Current business scope)
• Financial Capacity
• Business Strengths & other resources (Human resources/Warehouse Capacity/Distributive methods)
• The area of willing to operate/cover
• Banker.

Address:
Head of Customer Development Operations, 
Unilever Sri Lanka,
258 M. 
Vincent Perera Mawatha, 
Colombo 14,
Sri Lanka.

Inbound Message: I have a question. Can you help?
Replied Post:
Hi Sujeewa, Thank you for contacting Pureit Sri Lanka!
Pureit Marvella UV G2 has 4 stages of purification which ensures you get clean and safe water. The sediment filter removes the impurities, followed by the Activated Carbon filter and the Mesh filter that removes chlorine, harmful pesticides and dirt particles and finally the high intensity UV rays ensure maximum inactivation of bacteria and viruses to provide you with 100 percent UV purified water.

 Pureit Marvella UV G2 is equipped with Smartsense filter indicators which is a digital advance system that alerts you (the LED indicator will start blinking red alert) 15 days before the life of a Germ Kill Kit so that you know when it is time to change your filters. In case you do not replace it within 15 days, then the Auto Shut Off feature stops the supply of water automatically. This technology offers you and your family 100% assurance of safety for your drinking water.


 Pureit Marvella UV G2 powerful UV shield technology provides 100 percent UV safe water by destroying hazardous illness causing germs and viruses. Filters remove pollutants, grime, pesticides, and odour causing and bad tasting organic compounds from water at various stages of purification to ensure you obtain wholesome water that is known to improve your general well being.

Inbound Message: Hi Team Marmite SL! Big fan since childhood here (I literally eat Marmite like other people eat Nutella...) I just have a small request. As a vegan, Marmite is not only something I love it's something I need, especially because it's the easiest source of vitamin B12. Now I understand that not every vegan will eat Marmite like I do (no jokes, I LOVE it!) but perhaps you could do a campaign on nutrition for people on plant based diets informing them about getting their Vitamin B12 from Marmite. RDI of vitamin B12 is about 2 or 3 micro grams per day. If I'm not mistaken, that's like 2 teaspoons of Marmite per day. All people would have to do is mix some Marmite with hot water, add in some lime juice and drink it like soup if they don't want to eat it straight off the jar like I do. Inbound Message:
Celeste is all about inclusivity and spreading love unconditionally 🤍

When working with brands our priority is to ensure that all our customers are being treated equally. We share a truly special bond with team Unilever ustore.lk as we share the same values and beliefs as pioneering brands in SL making an effort to create a better future to the community. 

Our riders are our heroes behind the curtains who does the hardest part by delivering all orders to our customer’s doorstep from 6.00 am to 2.30 am and to see them speaking for brands they believe in is truly a validation beyond any award. 

As we turn 3 this week together with Unilever we decided to ask some of our PickMe Riders what their favorite and most useful products are and ended up surprising them with a gift! 

Stay tuned to hear more on what we’ve been up to ✨

#pickme #pickmemarket #unilever #products #riders #colombo #celestedaily #colombostyle #lifestyle #live #love #goals #goodvibes #spreadlove #community #inclusion #diversity #support #believe #hardwork #surprise
Replied Post:

Hi Sudeera, Thank you for contacting Unilever Sri Lanka! 
If you wish to register with us as a Distributor (Business Partner to sell Unilever products in a given territory) please send us a request letter through normal post addressed to the Customer Development Excellence,
The letter should cover few main areas,
• Business Background (Current business scope)
• Financial Capacity
• Business Strengths & other resources (Human resources/Warehouse Capacity/Distributive methods)
• The area of willing to operate/cover
• Banker

Address:
Head of Customer Development Operations, Unilever Sri Lanka,
258 M. Vincent Perera Mawatha, Colombo 14,
Sri Lanka.

Dear Sir/Madam,

The "Kurunegala District Women's and Men's Volleyball Tournament" is one of the largest tournaments in the history organized by the Janadiriya Foundation, the Kurunegala District Volleyball Association, and the Mahawa Regional Registrar's Office. This tournament is specifically designed for volleyball players residing in the Kurunegala District.

To the best of our knowledge, there has never been such a tournament organized in the Kurunegala District before. Given the significant expenses associated with hosting this event, we kindly request your support in the form of a sponsorship contribution to ensure the success of this endeavor.


Thank you for considering our request. We greatly appreciate your support.

Sincerely,
Charith prasanna
Chairman "janadiriya foundation.

National tourist service providers association

මම උපතින් ටිකක් කලුයී. මගේ වයස අවුරුදු 19යී. මම සැලෝන් එකකින් සුදු වෙන්න ක්‍රීම් එකක් ගෑවා. ඒකේ නම "මැජික් "කියලා එකකුයී "බෙලාසෝ" කියලා එකකුයී. ඒක ගාලා මගේ මූණ සුදු උනා. ලස්සන උනා. මම ටික දවසකට  ඒක  නතර කරලා ආයුර්වේද එකක් ගෑවා. ඊට පස්සේ මට ඇලරික් උනා. ඊට පස්සේ මම ඩොක්ටර් කෙනෙක් ව චැනල් කරලා බෙහෙත් ගත්තා. මට ඊට පස්සේ හොද උනා. 

මම දැන් පොන්ස් ක්‍රීම් එකයී වොෂ් එකයි යූස් කරන්න පටන් ගත්තොත් මට මොකක් හරි අවුලක් වෙයිද.... මම දැන් තලඑලලුයී. මගේ මූණ සමහර වෙලාවට වේලිලා වගේ තියනවා, සමහර වෙලාවට තෙල් ගතියට තියනවා. මට කියන්න පුළුවන් ද මට පොන්ස් වල මොන ඒවද  පාවිච්චි කරන්න හොද

Inbound Message: I filed four complaints and still no response
Replied Post:
Pureit Marvella UV G2 has 4 stages of purification which ensures you get clean and safe water. The sediment filter removes the impurities, followed by the Activated Carbon filter and the Mesh filter that removes chlorine, harmful pesticides and dirt particles and finally the high intensity UV rays ensure maximum inactivation of bacteria and viruses to provide you with 100 percent UV purified water.

 Pureit Marvella UV G2 is equipped with Smartsense filter indicators which is a digital advance system that alerts you (the LED indicator will start blinking red alert) 15 days before the life of a Germ Kill Kit so that you know when it is time to change your filters. In case you do not replace it within 15 days, then the Auto Shut Off feature stops the supply of water automatically. This technology offers you and your family 100% assurance of safety for your drinking water.


 Pureit Marvella UV G2 powerful UV shield technology provides 100 percent UV safe water by destroying hazardous illness causing germs and viruses. Filters remove pollutants, grime, pesticides, and odour causing and bad tasting organic compounds from water at various stages of purification to ensure you obtain wholesome water that is known to improve your general well being.

Inbound Message:
Dear Sir/Madam,

The "Kurunegala District Women's and Men's Volleyball Tournament" is one of the largest tournaments in the history organized by the Janadiriya Foundation, the Kurunegala District Volleyball Association, and the Mahawa Regional Registrar's Office. This tournament is specifically designed for volleyball players residing in the Kurunegala District.

To the best of our knowledge, there has never been such a tournament organized in the Kurunegala District before. Given the significant expenses associated with hosting this event, we kindly request your support in the form of a sponsorship contribution to ensure the success of this endeavor.


Thank you for considering our request. We greatly appreciate your support.

Sincerely,
Charith prasanna
Chairman "janadiriya foundation.
General secretary 
National tourist service providers association
0773888320
Replied Post:
Hello Sameem, and thank you for contacting Horlicks Sri Lanka! 
For assistance, please contact our customer service team at 1323 (toll-free hotline) or SMS/WhatsApp 0777002700.

Inbound Message: Me cream eka thiyenawada?
Replied Post: Lakmé Sri Lanka වෙතින් ඇණවුම් කිරීම ගැන ස්තුතියි 🙂 ඔබගේ ඇණවුම තහවුරු කර ඇති අතර ඔබගේ ඇණවුම් අංකය UST350031382 බව කරුණාවෙන් සලකන්න. සාමාන්‍යයෙන් අප වැඩ කරන දින 3-4ක් ඇතුළත ඔබගේ ඇණවුම ලැබීමට සලස්වන අතර කොළඹ සහ තෝරාගත් තදාසන්න ප්‍රදේශවල ඇණවුම් දින 2-3ක් ඇතුළත බෙදා හැරේ. එය බෙදාහැරීමට පෙර අපගේ බෙදාහැරීම් නියෝජිතයෙකු ඔබ හා සම්බන්ධ වනු ඇත.
